high_descs: walk to face left side of bureau
turn on light on bureau top
anns.task_desc: turn on light on bureau top while holding clock

high_descs: Turn to the left and face the lamp on the dresser.
Pick the clock up from the dresser.
Move to the side of the dresser and face the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a clock and turn a lamp on.

high_descs: Go forward to the end of the bed, hang a left and go to the dresser.
Pick up the clock that is on the dresser.
Turn to the left, go to the end of the dresser and hang a right, turn to the right to face the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a clock and turn a lamp on.
